description: Enterprise reporting table for patient topic items.

columns.name: PED_ID
columns.description: The Unique ID for the Patient Education Record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Line count for the Patient education topic data.

columns.name: PAT_TOPIC_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the patient education topic. It is stored in internal format and can be used to link to the teaching topic (IED) master file.

columns.name: PAT_TOPIC_TITLE_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the patient education title to which the topic is attached to. It is stored in internal format and can be used to link to the teaching title (IED) master file.

columns.name: PAT_TOPIC_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
A category item that specifies each topic's status.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Resolved


Deleted

columns.name: PAT_TOPIC_KEY
columns.description: The education topic key for patient education record. This is a string of Title^Topic
